channel.title: Comments on: The Manhattan Declaration and Apple Apps
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: dz
item.dc:creator: dz
item.description: The apps for the Talmud and Tanya immediately come to mind. Of course there are sections of those works that are just as "likely to expose a group to harm” and “to be objectionable and potentially harmful to others” as the Manhattan Declaration.
item.content:encoded: The apps for the Talmud and Tanya immediately come to mind. Of course there are sections of those works that are just as “likely to expose a group to harm” and “to be objectionable and potentially harmful to others” as the Manhattan Declaration.
